content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Solution Architecture School (SAS) is an educational program of EPAM CTO Office for the\\r employees growing in the Solution Architecture direction. This course is aimed at delivering\\r state-of-the-art knowledge and skills necessary to become a Solution Architect at EPAM.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Refer this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=8a3aa605-fb4b-4c26-8369-abd03e5da43b\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to start learning about the architecture concepts and can be completed in few\\r months.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On completion of this course, send a note to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Srikanth_Jadhav@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Srikanth_\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Srikanth_Jadhav@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Jadha\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"v@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" copying \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Basha_Syed@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Basha_Syed@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
